mapper.select: select * from product where product_name like #{product_name} order by product_name
mapper.insert: insert into product (product_name, description, price, filename) values (#{product_name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{filename})
mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{product_name}, price=#{price}, description=#{description}, filename=#{filename} where product_code=#{product_code}
